Home > Activity Agenda > Taipei Forum

2018 APEC Taipei Forum

Regional Industry-Academia Collaboration for Talent Development: An Exchange of Skills Training, Internships, and Jobs
5th June 2018
Room Descartes & Rousseau 5F PALAIS DE CHINE
TIME ITME TOPIC & SPEAKER
8:30–9:00 Registration
9:00–9:05 Opening Performance Taipei Tech's Formosan Aboriginal Culture Club
9:05–9:10 Group Photo
9:10–9:40 Opening Remarks
  • Vice President, Taipei University of Technology
    Dr. Thomas Chung-Kuang Yang
  • Political Deputy Minister, Ministry of Education
    Dr. Leehter Yao
  • Political Deputy Minister, Ministry of Foreign Affairs
    Dr. Wu-Chiao Hsieh
9:40–10:40 Panel Session 1
    Global International Programs of Industry-Academia Collaboration
  • Maria Gordeeva, Russia
    International Tourism and Hospitality Management
  • Kuei-Yen Liao, Ministry of Labor/HRDWG CBN
    APEC Skills Development Capacity Building Alliance (ASD-CBA): Fostering Connected APEC Through Upskilling
  • Benito G. Reys, Philippines
    Industry-Academe linkages bridge employment gap (Philippines)
  • Su cheng Lee, Canada
    Education in action: High talent mobility and employability
  • Graham Hart, Australia
    Introducing vocational skills at secondary school level
10:40–11:00 Tea Break
11:00–12:20 Panel Session 2 International Programs of Industry-Academia Collaboration in Chinese Taipei
1. Diploma Program
  • National Pingtung University of Science and Technology:
    International Bachelor Degree in Tropical Agriculture
  • National Chin-Yi University of Technology:
    Fall Semester International Bachelor Program of Industry-university Cooperation, 4-years Bachelor Degree, Department of Mechanical Engineering
2. Short-tern Program：
  • National Kaohsiung University of Science and Technology:
    International Master of Finance Scholarship Program—A Joint Program between the Cathay United Bank and the NKUST
  • Nan Kai University of Technology:
    Short-term Professional and Technical Talent Training Class Form Nan-Kai University of Technology
3. Q&A
12:20–12:30 Closing Remarks Director General, Department of Technological and Vocational Education, Ministry of Education
Yu-Huei Yang
